component.name: org.nuxeo.ecm.platform.workflow.document.service.WorkflowDocumentSecurityPolicyServiceDefaultExtensions

extension.documentation: This security policy distributes ACEs to the workflow participants (i.e : the users with active work items) in an homogeneous way. Every participant gets the same rights.
This security policy doesn't distribute the rights among participants in a an homogeneous way. It considers a master participant granted with more rights than the others.
